transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Hello. Haanji sir Sangvita Traders se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haanji haanji bataiye.
Executive: Ji main IndiaMART head office se baat kar raha hun. Kaise hain?
Customer: Badhiya badhiya.
Executive: Woh na aapka ek buyer supplier wala resolve hua ya nahi?
Customer: Kaunsa?
Executive: Buyer supplier ka aapke issue tha na?
Customer: Kaunsa kya tha bataiye?
Executive: Buyer suppliers ke leke ek tha complain main bata deta hun. Ek second hold kariye.

Customer: Are are nahi hai bhai ye toh mere mein nahi aate purane hai toh bhai isse dar apne pareshan ho rahe ho.
Customer: Jitna purana hai utna pareshan ho rahe ho.
Customer: System mein rehna hai.

Executive: Ye aapka tha ek second.

Executive: Yours karke hai sir kuch ek second. Jammu ka hai kya koi?
Executive: Main bata raha hun.
Executive: Line pe rahiyega.

: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Ah ye hai buyer ka naam bata deta hun main. Himanshi Kamboj 9 November ko aaya tha 7:01 pe.
Executive: Mera order kab tak deliver hoga?
Customer: Abhi tak deliver nahi hua hai kya order?
Executive: Nahi inka deliver nahi hua hai abhi. Ah tabhi toh ticket khula pada hai. Us din aap bol rahe the mere se isi ka hai ye.
Customer: Aisa kab tak isme date dalna hai? Ye toh complain nahi dala tha mere naam pe bola.
Executive: Mail kar rakha usne IndiaMART ko.
Customer: Haan ek baar bola complain wumplain toh bhaiya maine kuch nahi kiya tha main toh just dekh raha tha main unse puch raha tha ki bhaiya kab tak aayega. Usne usne dekhiye mail kiya hai buyer help desk se.
Executive: Kyunki product usko nahi mila hai.
Customer: Achha achha. Aapko isko deliver karna padega customer ko.
Customer: Haan toh usse toh baat ho hi raha woh toh mere ko bola maine usko phone kiya pehle usi ko phone kiya toh woh bolta bhaiya maine toh aisa kuch nahi dala tha. Main toh just daala tha ki mera maal kab pahunchega main puch raha tha bas wahan pe. Hmm hmm. Hmm.
Executive: Aur ek aur aayi hai ek second bata deta hun. Darsh karke hai kya koi? D A R A S H.
Executive: Darsh karke tha koi?
Customer: Himanshu ek minute Himanshu wala bataiye pehla wala bataiye toh.
Executive: Darsh ek Darsh karke aa raha hai ek Himanshi aa raha hai do mila hai mere ko.
Customer: Ye har Darsh wala hi toh mere ko bola tha Himanshi wala. Haan toh Darsh Darsh wale mein kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Darsh wale ka hi toh maine bataya aapko. Haan aaj ke Darsh wale ka kya kya issue kya hua hai I have already paid karke likha hai usne payment shayad kar rakha hai product nahi deliver hua hai. Haan woh maal bhi toh nikal gaya uska usse toh baat hota hi hai. Toh usko aap bolo ek baar dala nahi tha maine just dekhne ke liye dala. Agar agar usko dekhiye usko agar samaan mil gaya ho usko bolo aapki buyer help desk pe mail kar de ya toh IndiaMART ko phone karke bata de ki mujhe product receive ho gaya lekin inko paise pata lagega. Isi ko aap dekho. Aur ek kaun kya bataya naam kya bataya Himanshu?
Executive: Haan ek Himanshi Kamboj.
Executive: Ladki hai Himanshi Kamboj karke. 10 November ka tha.
Customer: Haan Himanshi Kamboj. Kuch aa nahi raha hai mere ko. Shayad check karna padega.
Customer: 9 November ka hai kya?
Executive: Haan 9 November wala hi main bol raha hun.
Executive: Toh ho gaya na Darsh ho gaya Himanshi ho gaya.
Customer: Himanshi ne toh maine maal hi nahi diya hai na usse baat hua mera.
Executive: Isme toh aa raha hai.
Customer: Par aap dekh lena side pe check kar lena. Himanshi kya bol rahi hai kya bol rahi hai usne kya dala? Product product deliver nahi hua hai usko bhi.
Customer: Nahi Himanshi. Darsh Darsh wala toh Darsh Darsh wala toh likha tha aaj 60 din pehle maine order kiya ab deliver nahi hua jisne order liya tha uska naam Anurag Shah hai sab likha pada hai isme.
Executive: Uska pura naam batata hun Himanshi wale ka ek second rukna aap.
Customer: Kahan ki hai kahan ki hai?
Executive: Main bata raha hun. Nahi nahi Darsh ka hi hai sorry sorry Himanshi Kamboj yahan naam toh galti se maine bol diya ticket bada tha na dhyan nahi diya maine. Okay okay okay. Darsh ka hi hai Darsh wala kab tak aap resolve kar doge?
Customer: Sorry sir aaj hi resolve ho jayega main aaj hi usko phone karwata hun. Haan usko phone karke aap bol do ki haan at least inform mujhe pata toh rahe. Aur main aapko na ek buyer buyer supplier education ka ek mail bhej raha hun usko aap padh lijiyega. In future jab bhi aap deal karte ho kisi buyer ke sath jo terms and conditions hai usme IndiaMART ki koi nahi hogi usme kuch guidelines hoti hai usko aap padh lijiyega. Ki advance payment lena product time pe deliver karna buyer agar aapko payment kar raha hai toh product product time time se deliver karo aap buyer ko usme kuch guideline di gayi hai woh main mail kar deta hun usko aap padh lijiyega go through kar lijiyega. Kahin na samajh mein aaye toh aap bata dena. Jo mera abhi IndiaMART mein hai usme sara packet ka aa raha hai koi jar aur ka aa raha hai koi kuch aa raha hai.
Customer: Jar car hai?
Customer: Haan packet packet ka hi aa raha hai.
Executive: By lead mein?
Customer: Hmm. By lead mein ek second rukiye nahi tea ka hi aa raha hai bas. Chaar tea ka dikha raha hai dekhiye main abhi toh khol ke hi baitha hua hun. Sabse pehli lead aapke paas wahan ki aa rahi hai Bellary Karnataka ki tea karke hai. Virama gold tea hai aapka premium tea hai. Ye Virma gold tea hai packet ho gaya theek hai 700 gram. Aap dekhiye usme main batata hun Virma hai woh chai basically theek hai ab woh brand hai Virma. Toh chai toh apna product sahi hai na tea toh aap hata nahi sakte ho keyword. Tea keyword hai toh tea se related hi aa raha hai na toh brand toh aayega hi Tata ka bhi aayega uska bhi aayega woh toh sara hi aayega na. Kyunki aapka main product chai hi hai tea keyword toh hata nahi sakte hain na uska toh lead aayega hi aayega.
Aap ek kaam kariye ga jo by lead aapko nahi chahiye matlab jo brand wali leads hai Tata aur ye Virma wagera ka isko not relevant pe specification mein jaake type kar dijiyega we do not deal in this brand. Delete pe aap click karoge wahan pe saat panch option khulega order value ka khulega theek hai location ka khulega wahan pe ye wala option choose karna I don't I do not deal in this specification usme type kar dena ki we do not deal in this brand theek hai. Aisa kar lena aap jitni brand ki lead aa rahi hai brand ki sari lead not relevant kar dijiyega jisme aapko deal nahi karna hai. Theek hai theek hai theek hai. Ye kar lijiyega baki woh fund wunnd ka hua kuch hai kuch plan wagera hai ya nahi?
Customer: Nahi abhi main bata dunga main aapko.
Executive: Haan is is month hai kuch chance agla pichla month toh nikal hi diya aapne pura aap bol rahe the. Is month bhi dekhta hun hone ka toh chance dikh raha hai. Haan dekh lijiyega part party karna hai aapko kaunsa pura karna hai woh aap kar lijiyega. Isko aap resolve kara ke ek baar mere ko message dal dijiyega aur not relevant aap kariye. Ji ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had buyer supplier issue.

- Customer has not received product from Himanshi.

- Customer is receiving irrelevant leads (brands).



Resolution:

- Executive checked on buyer supplier issue.

- Executive provided details of Himanshi Kamboj's order.

- Executive explained how to mark irrelevant leads.

- Executive will send buyer supplier education mail.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call Darsh to resolve issue.

- Customer will message executive after resolution.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, delivery, resolution, irrelevant leads
